Well, has anyone else noticed this?

there is an insane supply, minimal demand and prices keep getting undercut to the point that cards, background, ect...are worthless. (aside from TF2 and DOTA2 stuff.)

I don't always buy items on the Steam market....but when I do, I buy the things that are higher price than the lowest one available, and you all should too. (not saying buy the $10k common card, but don't go for the $0.08 one when there is a reasonable $0.12 next to it, doing this enough will inflate the market and then you can actually profit.)

Though I'm no economist.
I don't mess with the steam marketplace, i just use steam to buy and play my games.

well i like to use the market to buy keys in TF2 for a cheap price.

but yeah, the price of stuff is going down far too quickly.
